product_name: Leki Micro Vario Carbon Men's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: These light and durable carbon poles feature Aergon grips known for their edgeless shape and comfortable hand positioning. Plus, an internal tension cord automatically boosts durability at any length.
short_description: These light and durable carbon poles feature Aergon grips known for their edgeless shape and comfortable hand positioning. Plus, an internal tension cord automatically boosts durability at any length.
